channel.description: Recent content in Posts on caon.io

item.title: Recon Tips - Fuzz Machine Setup
item.description: If you are a security researcher, security engineer, red teamer, bug hunter or really anything related to security, you will, eventually, realize that it is next to impossible to keep everything mapped together in a company with a large infrastructure. Especially when needing to test from a blackbox approach. There’s a lot of ground to cover, to keep servers secure it is necessary to have a minimum amount of automation running.

item.title: CVE 2021 38314 - WordPress and Redux Write up
item.description: This is an upcoming writeup, this CVE is pretty new I could not find any article explaining the actual exploitation steps. Just found a nuclei templates that shows the half-way concept.
